column2: Such a wonderful day today. Too bad I'm rooted in one spot >:/ #rustled
column4: Beautiful day, nobody better f#@k it up. #GetRekt
column5: Blue skies smiling at me, nothin' but blue skies... http://youtu.be/K01YNsa_8m8

column2: Rain, rain go away. Come again another day. #drowning
column3: Looking bad outside. Hope I don't see any cows flying around. #twister #tornado
column4: Looking like rain, or hail, or something. Whatever comes this way, it better not mess, or I'll round up my plant homies.
column5: Thunderbolts and lightning, very very frightening me #FreddysMyMan

column2: It's getting hot in here, so take off all your leaves. @nelly_mo
column3: I might not be in Florida, but this temperature is fine with me #OnVacation
column5: Fahrenheit 451 - The temperature at which plants cease to exist.

column2: Cooooold.... aaaaas iiiiiiiice, I'm as cold as ice.
column3: It's feeling a bit chilly in here, bro-skis.
column4: Any colder, and they'll be unthawing me 1000 years later as the most bad-ass ice-ma... ice-plant alive.
column5: My monocot leaves are freezing :(. Heat plz.

column2: It's like a Finnish sauna in here #humidity #offdachartz
column3: The air is kinda wet, almost too wet... #wut
column4: Air's so moist I could swim through it.

column2: It hasn't been this dry outside since my cameo in @BreakingBad_AMC
column3: I'm so dry. No, not of alcohol, I'm always covered on that front.
column4: Losing moisture pretty fast, it'd be cool-beans if someone could take care of this. Or not... whatever, not like I depend on you or anthing... ass.

column3: Help I've fallen, and I can't get up :[ #TooYoungForLifeAlert

column4: So wet I may as well be #OnABoat

column3: I'm drying up, man. This might be the end. If I die, I blame Nick Heindle! http://i.imgur.com/d2aoYcY.jpg

column2: You are my sunshine, my only sunshine!
column4: Sun, sun, sun, here it comes! @thebeatles

column2: Darkness, imprisoning me. All that I see, absolute horror. #one @metallica
column3: Nobody knows... the trouble I've seen... Sure is dark in here.
column4: It's darker in here than my outlook on life #zing
column5: It might be dark, but I can still see you. Nobody try nothing strange. #BigBrother
column6: Light levels are low but I'm #AlwaysWatching like #BigBrother

column2: Nice and quiet near me. Nobody better mess w/ this #thuglife
column3: So quiet here you could almost hear me whistle.
column5: Quiet enough to hear myself think... Nice.
column6: Maybe it's a bit too quiet, I could go for some classical music. Maybe even some smooth jazz.

column2: If it gets any louder than this, I'm going to have to unroot myself and take care of this shit myself.
The Fox by Ylvis is stuck in my head. Metaphorically, anyhow... #WhatDoesThePlantSay
column3: Are you a horticulture major? Because I have a large apical meristem that needs examining. #whatamIdoingwithmylife
column4: Just absorbed some DAMN FINE nitrogen.

column2: When you die I'll eat you. #ItsOkImaPlant
column3: If a plant picks up nutrients from a died plant, is it a cannibal? #suchwonder
column4: Still haven't recovered from my flight here :(
